topic.title: The Advertising Currency (tac)
topic.body:
A cryptocurrency project to decentralize the very corrupt industries of advertising and marketing. 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KjcBwjHx388e4jGXmEKYvGuyrk2CMpTMC/

Youtube video on the subject: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IStvOSyfoQc

topic.title: Some details about marketing, corruption, and TAC

9_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body: iframes are not the way to go, you should be utilizing the disqus API in your backend. https://github.com/disqus/DISQUS-API-Recipes/

1_1M7mNWkk2eJQqeWw5KexXWHo565mmnXCU9.body:
We will definitely be posting this on bitcointalk. It will be posted on Nov 1. We are trying to build a community of at least 1000 before we announce to bitcoin talk - but either way it will be announced Nov 1 - one months before the ICO launch.

Our linkedin Community: https://www.linkedin.com/groups/12068329
Our Apsense Community: http://www.apsense.com/group/tactoken

We will not have a bounty program specifically. We do things a bit differently than most other projects. For example we currently have a writing contest going https://www.patreon.com/posts/writing-contest-14821090

1_1Hi4RVifuGzNREHKBfBZqvhZtfckZczBSV.body: lol anyone having and accepting tax paid healthcare has no concept of freedom.

2_1M7mNWkk2eJQqeWw5KexXWHo565mmnXCU9.body:
I actually didn't know of either of those sites and will check them out. 

However I would say you are very incorrect in thinking no one will read those. Do you think people don't use clearweb? Even on TOR countless websites link to clearnet information.

As awesome as zeronet is, I don't think most are ready to abandon the clearweb just yet. 

In any event as I said I didn't actually know of those links - I will check them out and perhaps start posting to them :)
